data.name: 3 year Fixed Rate Home Loan
data.description: The IMB Fixed Rate Home Loan gives you peace of mind with the security of fixed loan repayments. Fixed rate terms of 1-5 Years and up to 12 months repayments in advance without penalty

features.additionalInfo: Internet Banking and Mobile Banking App.

IMB Alerts keep you up to date by sending you SMS or email alerts regarding your banking. Account Alerts help you keep track of your finances and Internet Banking Security Alerts to help keep you safe online. You can register for Alerts in Internet Banking.
Direct Credit is available on this account type.
Receive Electronic Funds Transfers (EFT) to this account type.
IMB boasts an extensive branch network throughout the Illawarra, Sydney, NSW South Coast, the ACT and Melbourne.
IMB consultants are available Monday to Friday 8am - 8pm and Saturday 9am - 4pm

features.additionalValue: Free redraw via internet and mobile banking

features.additionalInfo: Enjoy up to $2,500 cashback when you switch your eligible home loan to IMB Bank. Apply between 08/09/23 and 30/09/23, and settle by 31/12/23. Lending and eligability criteria, T&Cs apply
Up to 12 months repayments in advance without penalty

A Family Guarantee allows family to assist their children in the purchase of a property without actually providing a cash gift or cash loan. It could also allow borrowers to include some of the costs of purchasing, such as stamp duty and legal costs in the loan amount.

constraints.additionalInfo: Up to 95% of the property value

eligibility.additionalValue: Borrowers must be Australian Citizens or permanent residents.

fees.name: Loan Application Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Application fee includes one valuation. Valuation costs over & above single/primary security are to be covered by the borrower. Other fees and charges may apply.

fees.name: Additional Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If the loan is to be against more than one security, additional valuation costs will be collected at settlement.

fees.name: Redraw Fee (free via internet and mobile banking)
fees.additionalInfo: Redraws are FREE via internet banking, otherwise a fee applies

fees.name: Split Loan Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to IMB if a loan is split into more than one account.

fees.name: Other fees and charges may apply.
fees.additionalInfo: A full list of fees and charges will be provided if loan is approved.

fees.name: PEXA Fee - Single Title
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to the Property Exchange Australia for electronic lodgement of any transaction on title.

fees.name: PEXA Fee - Multiple Title
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to the Property Exchange Australia for electronic lodgement of any transaction on titles.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: For Owner Occupier loan purpose with Principal and Interest repayments. The comparison rate is based on a $150,000 secured loan for a term of twenty five years for all home loans. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.

For Owner Occupier loan purpose with Principal and Interest repayments. The comparison rate is based on a $150,000 secured loan for a term of twenty five years for all home loans. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.

For Owner Occupier loan purpose with Interest Only repayments. The comparison rate is based on a $150,000 secured loan for a term of twenty five years for all home loans. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.

For Investment loan purpose with Principal and Interest repayments. The comparison rate is based on a $150,000 secured loan for a term of twenty five years for all home loans. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.

For Investment loan purpose with Interest Only repayments. The comparison rate is based on a $150,000 secured loan for a term of twenty five years for all home loans. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.
